question: Where are the users located and how many followers do they have who have tagged me in tweets with the crypto hashtag and posted from the Twitter for iPhone app?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)
MATCH (tweet)-[mentions:MENTIONS]->(me:Me)
MATCH (tweet)-[tags:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag {name:"crypto"})
MATCH (tweet)-[using:USING]->(source:Source {name:"Twitter for iPhone"})
RETURN user, posts, tweet, mentions, me, tags, hashtag, using, source, user.location, user.followers

question: Can you identify the profile image urls of users who retweeted tweets that originally contained links to nytimes.com and were tagged with worldnews?
cypher:
MATCH (originalTweet:Tweet)-[relation5:CONTAINS]->(link:Link)
MATCH (retweet:Tweet)-[relation6:RETWEETS]->(originalTweet)
MATCH (retweetUser:User)-[relation7:POSTS]->(retweet)
MATCH (originalTweet)-[relation8:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag {name:"worldnews"})
WHERE link.url CONTAINS 'nytimes.com'
RETURN relation8, relation7, relation6, relation5, originalTweet, link, retweet, retweetUser, hashtag, retweetUser.profile_image_url

question: List the screen names and URLs of users who follow users that have tweeted about me using tweets tagged with AI and originating from Twitter Web App.
cypher:
MATCH (follower:User)-[follows:FOLLOWS]->(followed:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[tags:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag {name:"AI"})
MATCH (tweet)-[using:USING]->(source:Source {name:"Twitter Web App"})
MATCH (tweet)-[mentions:MENTIONS]->(me:Me)
RETURN follower, follows, followed, posts, tweet, tags, hashtag, using, source, mentions, me, follower.screen_name, follower.url

question: Provide the names and locations of Me nodes that are followed by users who posted tweets containing the hashtag startup and mentioning the user johndoe.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[tags:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag {name:"startup"})
MATCH (tweet)-[mentions:MENTIONS]->(mentionedUser:User {screen_name:"johndoe"})
MATCH (user)-[relation8:FOLLOWS]->(me:Me)
RETURN relation8, user, posts, tweet, tags, hashtag, mentions, mentionedUser, me, me.name, me.location

question: What are the usernames and display pictures of Users who retweeted messages that include the hashtag machinelearning and contain links from github.com?
cypher:
MATCH (hashtag:Hashtag {name:"machinelearning"})<-[tags:TAGS]-(tweet:Tweet)-[contains:CONTAINS]->(link:Link {url:"github.com"})
MATCH (retweet:Tweet)-[retweets:RETWEETS]->(tweet)
MATCH (user:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(retweet)
RETURN user, posts, retweet, retweets, tweet, tags, hashtag, contains, link, user.screen_name, user.profile_image_url

question: Display the username and follower count of Users who referenced alice_smith in tweets tagging blockchain and originating from Android App.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[post:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[tag:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag {name:"blockchain"})
MATCH (tweet)-[mention:MENTIONS]->(mentionedUser:User {screen_name:"alice_smith"})
MATCH (tweet)-[usingSource:USING]->(source:Source {name:"Android App"})
RETURN user, post, tweet, tag, hashtag, mention, mentionedUser, usingSource, source, user.name, user.following

question: What are the textual contents of original tweets, the sources used, and URLs in links for tweets that mention a user tom_clark who follows me?
cypher:
MATCH (mentionedUser:User {screen_name: 'tom_clark'})-[relation6:FOLLOWS]->(me:Me)
MATCH (tweet:Tweet)-[mentions:MENTIONS]->(mentionedUser)
MATCH (author:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet)
MATCH (tweet)-[using:USING]->(source:Source)
OPTIONAL MATCH (tweet)-[contains:CONTAINS]->(link:Link)
RETURN relation6, mentionedUser, me, tweet, mentions, author, posts, using, source, contains, link, tweet.text, source.name, link.url

question: Could you supply information on the interactions (mentions and retweets) involving tweets with the music hashtag and original tweets from users in New York?
cypher:
MATCH (tweet:Tweet)-[tag:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag {name:"music"})
MATCH (user:User {location:"New York"})-[post:POSTS]->(originalTweet:Tweet)
MATCH (tweet)-[mention:MENTIONS]->(user)
MATCH (tweet)-[retweet:RETWEETS]->(originalTweet)
RETURN tweet, tag, hashtag, user, post, originalTweet, mention, retweet, tweet.id, tweet.text, originalTweet.id, originalTweet.text

question: List all tweets using Desktop Client, their hashtags, and details of follow relations between the authors of those tweets and me.
cypher:
MATCH (tweet:Tweet)-[usingRel:USING]->(source:Source {name:'Desktop Client'})
MATCH (tweet)-[tagRel:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
MATCH (author:User)-[postRel:POSTS]->(tweet)
MATCH (author)-[followRel:FOLLOWS]->(me:Me)
RETURN source, tweet, usingRel, hashtag, tagRel, author, postRel, followRel, me, tweet.text, tweet.created_at, hashtag.name, author.screen_name, me.screen_name

question: Retrieve the follower relations between me and other users, including mentions in tweets with sports hashtag posted using Mobile Web.
cypher:
MATCH (me:Me)-[follow:FOLLOWS]->(user:User)
MATCH (me)-[post:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[tag:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag {name:"sports"})
MATCH (tweet)-[use:USING]->(source:Source {name:"Mobile Web"})
MATCH (tweet)-[mention:MENTIONS]->(user)
RETURN me, follow, user, post, tweet, tag, hashtag, use, source, mention, me.screen_name, user.screen_name

question: Display the tweet texts that contain links to espn.com, who they reply to, and if those responded tweets have any mention of Usain Bolt.
cypher:
MATCH (initialTweet:Tweet)-[containsLink:CONTAINS]->(link:Link {url: "espn.com"})
MATCH (initialTweet)-[replyToRelation:REPLY_TO]->(respondedTweet:Tweet)
MATCH (respondedTweet)-[mentionsRelation:MENTIONS]->(mentionedUser:User)
WHERE mentionedUser.name CONTAINS "Usain Bolt"
RETURN initialTweet, containsLink, link, replyToRelation, respondedTweet, mentionsRelation, mentionedUser, initialTweet.text

question: How many tweets tagged with holiday have been posted by users following me and what is the total number of followers those users have?
cypher:
MATCH (followingUser:User)-[relation4:FOLLOWS]->(me:Me),
      (followingUser)-[relation5:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[relation6:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE hashtag.name = 'holiday'
RETURN COUNT(tweet) AS TweetCount, SUM(followingUser.followers) AS TotalFollowers

question: What is the average number of likes on tweets that mention john_doe and tagged competition posted by users following more than 1000 people?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[mentions:MENTIONS]->(mentionedUser:User), (tweet)-[tags:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE user.following > 1000 AND mentionedUser.screen_name = 'john_doe' AND hashtag.name = 'competition'
RETURN AVG(tweet.favorites)

question: Compute the sum of favorites for tweets with the latestnews hashtag, posted by users following me who possess over 500 followers.
cypher:
MATCH (me:Me)<-[relation4:FOLLOWS]-(follower:User)-[relation5:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[relation6:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE hashtag.name="latestnews" AND follower.followers > 500
RETURN SUM(tweet.favorites)

question: Can you determine the average favorites counts for tweets mentioning Alex_123 under the science hashtag by users with follower counts exceeding 2000?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[relation4:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[relation5:MENTIONS]->(mentionedUser:User), 
      (tweet)-[relation6:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE mentionedUser.screen_name = 'Alex_123' AND hashtag.name = 'science' AND user.followers > 2000
RETURN AVG(tweet.favorites)

question: Find the number of unique users who tweeted links from forbes.com, mentioned me, and tagged finance in their tweets.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[post:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[contain:CONTAINS]->(link:Link), (tweet)-[mention:MENTIONS]->(me:Me), (tweet)-[tag:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE link.url CONTAINS 'forbes.com' AND hashtag.name = 'finance'
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT user)

question: What is the profile image URL of the user with the screen name tech_guru?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)
WHERE user.screen_name = "tech_guru"
RETURN user, user.profile_image_url

question: Please provide the URLs contained in the tweets that have been retweeted over 1000 times.
cypher:
MATCH (originalTweet:Tweet)-[relation3:RETWEETS]->(retweetedTweet:Tweet)-[relation4:CONTAINS]->(link:Link)
WHERE retweetedTweet.favorites > 1000
RETURN relation4, relation3, originalTweet, retweetedTweet, link, link.url

question: Which sources supplied tweets that were imported via the API method and have at least 500 favorites each?
cypher:
MATCH (tweet:Tweet)-[usingRel:USING]->(source:Source)
WHERE tweet.favorites >= 500 AND tweet.import_method = "API"
RETURN tweet, usingRel, source, source.name

question: Can I get the text of tweets posted by the user named Jane_Doe that contain a mention to John_Smith?
cypher:
MATCH (poster:User)-[relation3:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[relation4:MENTIONS]->(mentionedUser:User)
WHERE poster.screen_name = 'Jane_Doe' AND mentionedUser.screen_name = 'John_Smith'
RETURN relation4, relation3, poster, tweet, mentionedUser, tweet.text

question: What hashtags have been used by users located in New York City in tweets that received more than 200 favorites?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[relation3:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[relation4:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE user.location = "New York City" AND tweet.favorites > 200
RETURN relation4, relation3, user, tweet, hashtag, hashtag.name

question: What is the number of users in San Francisco with over 10000 followers?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)
WHERE user.location = "San Francisco" AND user.followers > 10000
RETURN count(user)

question: What is the average number of followers for users who follow more than 1000 people and have tweeted at least 500 tweets?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)
WHERE user.following > 1000 AND user.statuses >= 500
RETURN AVG(user.followers)

question: Could you tally how many hashtags appear in over 1000 tweets?
cypher:
MATCH (hashtag:Hashtag)<-[tag:TAGS]-(tweet:Tweet)
WITH hashtag, COUNT(tweet) AS tweetCount
WHERE tweetCount > 1000
RETURN COUNT(hashtag)

question: What is the maximum favorites a tweet has received among tweets containing the hashtag #holiday during December 2022?
cypher:
MATCH (tweet:Tweet)-[tag:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE hashtag.name="#holiday" AND tweet.created_at.year=2022 AND tweet.created_at.month=12
RETURN MAX(tweet.favorites)

question: What are the total and average retweets received by tweets from users with a follower count exceeding 5000?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[relation3:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)<-[relation4:RETWEETS]-(retweet:Tweet)
WHERE user.followers > 5000
RETURN SUM(retweet.favorites) AS totalRetweets, AVG(retweet.favorites) AS averageRetweets

question: How many tweets link to URLs that include news in their domain, and what is the average number of favorites these tweets have received?
cypher:
MATCH (tweet:Tweet)-[contains:CONTAINS]->(link:Link)
WHERE link.url CONTAINS "news"
RETURN count(tweet) AS NumberOfTweets, AVG(tweet.favorites) AS AverageFavorites

question: What are the locations of the users who posted tweets containing the link http://example.com?
cypher:
MATCH (tweet:Tweet)-[contains:CONTAINS]->(link:Link {url:"http://example.com"})
MATCH (user:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet)
RETURN tweet, contains, link, user, posts, user.location

question: Display the profile image URLs of all users who are followed by the user with the screen_name john_doe.
cypher:
MATCH (follower:User {screen_name:"john_doe"})-[follows:FOLLOWS]->(followedUser:User)
RETURN follower, follows, followedUser, followedUser.profile_image_url

question: Could you provide a list of all the hashtags that alice123 has included in her tweets?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User {screen_name:"alice123"})-[userPosts:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[tweetTags:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
RETURN user, userPosts, tweet, tweetTags, hashtag, hashtag.name

question: Show the text of tweets that replied to the tweet with id 987654321.
cypher:
MATCH (replyTweet:Tweet)-[replyTo:REPLY_TO]->(originalTweet:Tweet {id:987654321})
RETURN replyTweet, replyTo, originalTweet, replyTweet.text

question: List the screen names of Me nodes and then display the user whose screen_name is tech_guru.
cypher:
MATCH (followingUser:User {screen_name: 'tech_guru'})-[follows:FOLLOWS]->(targetMe:Me)
RETURN followingUser, follows, targetMe, targetMe.screen_name

question: Who do the users that sam_sparks directly follows go on to follow themselves?
cypher:
MATCH (userSam:User {screen_name:"sam_sparks"})-[relationSamFollower:FOLLOWS]->(followedUser:User)-[relationUserFollower:FOLLOWS]->(nextLevelUser:User)
RETURN userSam, relationSamFollower, followedUser, relationUserFollower, nextLevelUser, followedUser.screen_name, nextLevelUser.screen_name

question: Identify pairs of tweets where one tweet retweets another. Does the original tweet have more than 500 favorites?
cypher:
MATCH (originalTweet:Tweet)-[retweetRelation:RETWEETS]->(retweetedTweet:Tweet)
WHERE originalTweet.favorites > 500
RETURN originalTweet, retweetRelation, retweetedTweet, originalTweet.favorites

question: List all tweet pairs where a tweet replies to another, and check if the replied tweet has less than 50 favorites.
cypher:
MATCH (replyingTweet:Tweet)-[reply:REPLY_TO]->(repliedTweet:Tweet)
WHERE repliedTweet.favorites < 50
RETURN replyingTweet, reply, repliedTweet, replyingTweet.text, repliedTweet.text

question: Which tweets mention the Me node that has the location New York?
cypher:
MATCH (me:Me {location:"New York"})<-[relation2:MENTIONS]-(tweet:Tweet)
RETURN relation2, me, tweet, tweet.text

question: Supply information about tweets and the hashtags they use, especially focusing on the hashtag labeled worldnews.
cypher:
MATCH (tweet:Tweet)-[tag:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag {name:"worldnews"})
RETURN tweet, tag, hashtag, tweet.text

question: Can you show the relationship of the posts between users and tweets where the tweet contains the word breaking?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)
WHERE tweet.text CONTAINS 'breaking'
RETURN user, posts, tweet, tweet.text

question: What is the average number of followers for users who have mentioned the me node in their tweets?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[relation3:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[relation4:MENTIONS]->(me:Me)
RETURN AVG(user.followers)

question: How many individuals are followers of the me node, and what is the lowest follower count for those users?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[follows:FOLLOWS]->(me:Me)
RETURN count(user) AS NumberOfFollowers, min(user.followers) AS MinimumFollowers

question: Calculate the total number of tweets posted by users who follow more than 1000 other users.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)
WHERE user.following > 1000
RETURN COUNT(tweet)

question: What is the maximum number of statuses posted by any user who follows the me node with more than 5000 followers?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[follows:FOLLOWS]->(me:Me)
WHERE me.followers > 5000
RETURN MAX(user.statuses)

question: Count the tweets containing hashtags that have been retweeted more than 100 times.
cypher:
MATCH (tweet:Tweet)-[tags:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE tweet.favorites > 100
RETURN COUNT(tweet)

question: What is the sum of favorites received by tweets that were replied to by tweets from users located in California?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(replyTweet:Tweet)-[replyTo:REPLY_TO]->(originalTweet:Tweet)
WHERE user.location = "California"
RETURN SUM(originalTweet.favorites)

question: Who are the users that mentioned me in their tweets which also included the hashtag #blockchain?
cypher:
MATCH (me:Me)<-[mentioned:MENTIONS]-(tweet:Tweet)-[tags:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag), (user:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet)
WHERE hashtag.name = "#blockchain"
RETURN user, posts, me, mentioned, tweet, tags, hashtag, user.name

question: List the screen names of Me-followers who posted tweets that mentioned the user johndoe.
cypher:
MATCH (meFollower:Me)-[relation4:FOLLOWS]->(me:Me)-[relation5:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[relation6:MENTIONS]->(mentionedUser:User)
WHERE mentionedUser.screen_name="johndoe"
RETURN relation6, relation5, relation4, meFollower, me, tweet, mentionedUser, meFollower.screen_name

question: Obtain the profile picture links of users who retweeted tweets that include the URL http://example.com.
cypher:
MATCH (originalTweet:Tweet)-[relation4:CONTAINS]->(link:Link {url: "http://example.com"}), (retweet:Tweet)-[relation5:RETWEETS]->(originalTweet), (user:User)-[relation6:POSTS]->(retweet)
RETURN relation6, relation5, relation4, user, originalTweet, link, retweet, user.profile_image_url

question: Identify the locations of User nodes who follow me and have posted tweets using the source Android.
cypher:
MATCH (follower:User)-[follows:FOLLOWS]->(me:Me),
      (follower)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[using:USING]->(source:Source)
WHERE source.name = "Android"
RETURN follower, follows, me, posts, tweet, using, source, follower.location

question: Can you show the URLs from Link nodes contained in tweets that were posted by users located in New York?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[contains:CONTAINS]->(link:Link)
WHERE user.location = 'New York'
RETURN user, posts, tweet, contains, link, link.url

question: Itemize all hashtags from responses to tweets issued by a user who has over 5000 followers.
cypher:
MATCH (originalUser:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(originalTweet:Tweet)<-[replyTo:REPLY_TO]-(replyTweet:Tweet)-[tags:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE originalUser.followers > 5000
RETURN originalUser, posts, originalTweet, replyTo, replyTweet, tags, hashtag, hashtag.name

question: Which tweets mention me and are also tagged by the user alice? Describe the connection between these tweets and the user.
cypher:
MATCH (alice:User {screen_name: 'alice'})-[relation4:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[relation5:MENTIONS]->(me:Me), (tweet)-[relation6:TAGS]->(tag:Hashtag)
RETURN relation6, relation5, relation4, alice, tweet, me, tag, tweet.text

question: Identify the tweets that were retweeted and later replied to, with details on the connections.
cypher:
MATCH (originalTweet:Tweet)<-[retweetRelationship:RETWEETS]-(retweetedTweet:Tweet)-[replyRelationship:REPLY_TO]->(replyTweet:Tweet)
RETURN originalTweet, retweetRelationship, retweetedTweet, replyRelationship, replyTweet, originalTweet.text, retweetedTweet.text, replyTweet.text

question: Track the route of tweets posted by users following samsmith that include hashtags similar to #ai.
cypher:
MATCH (userFollowing:User)-[follows:FOLLOWS]->(userFollowed:User {screen_name: 'samsmith'}), (userFollowing)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[tags:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE hashtag.name='ai'
RETURN userFollowing, follows, userFollowed, posts, tweet, tags, hashtag, tweet.text

question: Provide the connections between tweets that contain the link https://tech.blog and were retweeted by users with over 1000 followers.
cypher:
MATCH (tweet:Tweet)-[containsLink:CONTAINS]->(link:Link), (user:User)-[posted:POSTS]->(tweet), (retweet:Tweet)-[retweets:RETWEETS]->(tweet)
WHERE link.url = 'https://tech.blog' AND user.followers > 1000
RETURN tweet, containsLink, link, user, posted, retweet, retweets, tweet.text

question: How many users have mentioned me in their tweets which include the hashtag #crypto?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[relation4:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[relation5:MENTIONS]->(me:Me),
      (tweet)-[relation6:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE hashtag.name="crypto"
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT user)

question: What is the typical follower count for users who have retweeted posts initially shared by janedoe?
cypher:
MATCH (originalPoster:User {name: "janedoe"})-[originalPost:POSTS]->(originalTweet:Tweet)<-[retweet:RETWEETS]-(retweetedTweet:Tweet)<-[posterPost:POSTS]-(retweeter:User)
RETURN AVG(retweeter.followers)

question: Calculate the total number of favorites received by tweets that contain a link to https://example.com posted by followers of charlie.
cypher:
MATCH (follower:User)-[relation4:FOLLOWS]->(charlie:User {screen_name: 'charlie'})
MATCH (follower)-[relation5:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[relation6:CONTAINS]->(link:Link {url: 'https://example.com'})
RETURN SUM(tweet.favorites)

question: Calculate how many unique platforms were used to post tweets that tagged me.
cypher:
MATCH (me:Me)-[relation3:MENTIONS]-(tweet:Tweet)-[relation4:USING]->(source:Source)
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT source)

question: What is the average number of tweets containing the #innovation hashtag mentioned by users located in Europe?
cypher:
MATCH (hashtag:Hashtag {name: "innovation"})<-[relation3:TAGS]-(tweet:Tweet)<-[relation4:POSTS]-(user:User {location: "Europe"})
RETURN AVG(user.statuses)

question: Can you determine the total number of statuses posted by users who follow both alice and bob and have mentioned them in tweets?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[relation6:FOLLOWS]->(alice:Me {screen_name: 'alice'}), 
      (user)-[relation7:FOLLOWS]->(bob:Me {screen_name: 'bob'}),
      (tweetAlice:Tweet)-[relation8:MENTIONS]->(alice),
      (tweetBob:Tweet)-[relation9:MENTIONS]->(bob),
      (user)-[relation10:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)
WHERE tweetAlice = tweetBob
RETURN SUM(user.statuses)
